scripts.tests: trash dist && tsc && npm run mocha
scripts.check-dependencies: npm run make-depcruiser-dir && depcruise --validate --output-type err-html -f ./reports/depcruiser/dependency-report.html --config .dependency-cruiser.js src test
scripts.mocha: npm run make-mochawesome-dir && mocha dist/test --timeout 50000 --exit --reporter mochawesome  --reporter-options reportDir=./reports/mochawesome,reportFilename=testReport
